node.name: eFace free edition - XAML for Java
node.shortdescription:
eFace is the Worldwide First XAML solution for Java. It provides an unified programming model for building both rich client and Web application. It keeps insulation for applications from the technology/environment change such as Swing, SWT or Web/Ajax.

It provides the following key benefits than the traditional programming solution:


  1. Rapid and domain-oriented (User Experience) development

  2. Cross-environment
    applications

  3. Insulation from technology change

  4. Ideal GUI component for MDD/MDA approach


The release 1.0.2 provides an "out of the box" integration with Eclipse RCP. It is a first solution to develop RCP based on XML GUI, without coding in Java.

http://www.soyatec.com/eface/images/architecture.png" width="573"/>

More information can be found on the http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com/Web_Links-index-req-visit-lid-1001.h... color="#FF6600">eFace pages.
node.body:
eFace is the Worldwide First XAML solution for Java. It provides an unified programming model for building both rich client and Web application. It keeps insulation for applications from the technology/environment change such as Swing, SWT or Web/Ajax.

It provides the following key benefits than the traditional programming solution:


  1. Rapid and domain-oriented (User Experience) development

  2. Cross-environment
    applications

  3. Insulation from technology change

  4. Ideal GUI component for MDD/MDA approach


The release 1.0.2 provides an "out of the box" integration with Eclipse RCP. It is a first solution to develop RCP based on XML GUI, without coding in Java.

http://www.soyatec.com/eface/images/architecture.png" width="573"/>

More information can be found on the http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com/Web_Links-index-req-visit-lid-1001.h... color="#FF6600">eFace pages.
